Name: StarPieceGroup
Notes: A group of Star Bits that are arranged in a circle or placed along a path.

Obj_arg0.Name: Number of Star Bits
Obj_arg0.Description: Amount of Star Bits to be distributed along the path or circle. Default is 6.

Obj_arg1.Name: Circle Placement Radius
Obj_arg1.Description: The radius of the Star Bit circle. Only used if a path has not been assigned. Default is 400.

Obj_arg2.Name: Path Placement Type
Obj_arg2.Description: Specifies how the Star Bits are placed on the path. This is only used when a path has been assigned.

Values.Notes: Evenly distribute Star Bits on path
Only one Star Bit per path point (ignores Obj_arg0)

Obj_arg3.Name: Color Frame
Obj_arg3.Description: The color frame to be used.

Values.Notes: Calculate shadow with gravity direction once

Obj_arg5.Name: Time Limit
Obj_arg5.Description: Specifies how long it takes before the Star Bits will disappear again. Default is -1, which makes the Star Bits appear indefinitely.

SW_APPEAR.Description: Appears when this switch is activated.

SW_A.Description: If used, the Star Bits will only be collectable while this switch is activated.

SW_B.Description: Once activated, all Star Bits will fall.

SW_AWAKE.Description: Enables rendering and resumes updates when this switch is active.

Rail.Description: Can be used to lay out the Star Bits on the path instead of a circle.

Group.Description: Groups objects of the same type, but the group is never used for anything.

ClippingGroup.Description: Objects in this group are always clipped together.

DemoCast.Description: The object and the Star Bits take part in the cutscene.
